attributes.action: MPs to be required by law to pay all their taxes by PAYE.
attributes.background: Most ordinary people have tax deducted at source from their wages or salary by PAYE. They have no chance of claiming for tax-deductible work expenses, eg work clothes and travel. Let there be a level playing field for taxation.

rejection.details:
We're not sure what your petition is asking for. MPs might have to pay many taxes which cannot be paid through PAYE; for example, capital gains tax. 

You can find out more about how MPs are taxed here: 

https://www.gov.uk/government/uploads/system/uploads/attachment_data/file/429906/2015-05-07_Tax_and_NI_guide_for_MPs_and_Ministers_accessible.pdf
